Straightshot turns to Lord Elder while holding Sirius in her hands.

" Tucs=
on went to search for Rodimus and the others.  I sure hope he comes back so=
on. "

Uproar trots into the room with a good sized fish in his jaws.

" Do=
n't spaz, I grabbed this when no one was around.  Caught it in the water ne=
ar by. "

He sets it down and tears off tiny little chunks for the babies.
=

" Dragons are pure meat eaters, and like birds, the hatchlings usually tak=
e small scraps of fish at a time.  Here, I know it's icky and slimy but thi=
s is how ya feed Em."

Straightshot now takes a tiny piece of fish into her=
 hand and presents it to Sirius.

" Well they need to eat so I guess it's o=
kay."

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and =
digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occ=
asion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me a=
t this address and we will talk.  

On Jul 18, 2012, at 8:12 AM, Super Cycl=
onus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> LORD ELDER just smiled as he watch=
ed the play of the children and the
> reactions that the other MAXIMALS wer=
e having to them. Having children
> in this manner was somehting that was a=
lien to CYBERTRONIANS but he
> had seen it among the natural life forms of =
this planet. He had seen
> countless recordings of such activities and find=
 it strangely
> refreshing to see it here.
> 
> However his smile faded as =
he remembered surrounding events.
> 
> "Tucson." He said gravely. "When you=
 are able to tear yourself away we
> need to talk." He shook his head. He h=
ad hoped to wait on RODIMUS, but
> things seemed to be progressing.
> 
> (T=
AG)
> 
> - Preston

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>LORD ELDER ju=
st smiled as he watched the play of the children and the<br>
reactions that=
 the other MAXIMALS were having to them. Having children<br>
in this manner=
 was somehting that was alien to CYBERTRONIANS but he<br>
had seen it among=
 the natural life forms of this planet. He had seen<br>
countless recording=
s of such activities and find it strangely<br>
refreshing to see it here.<b=
r>
<br>
However his smile faded as he remembered surrounding events.<br>
<b=
r>
"Tucson." He said gravely. "When you are able to tear yourself away we<b=
r>
need to talk." He shook his head. He had hoped to wait on RODIMUS, but<b=
r>
things seemed to be progressing.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
<=
br>
